#text=I really wanted to read the latest Stephen King book , but I did n't want to have to buy it , so I decided I could borrow the book from the library .
#text=I went online first , to check to see if my local library had a copy .
#text=All their 's were checked out , but another nearby library had several copies in stock .
#text=They also had a great new feature where I could reserve the book online , so I did that .
#text=I drove to the library , and went straight to the front desk .
#text=I told the librarian that I had reserved a copy of Stephen King 's new book online , and she asked for my library card and told me she 'd be right back .
#text=She brought the book to the counter , and used her computer to confirm that I had indeed reserved a copy of the book online .
#text=She gave me the book and told me I had two weeks before it was due back .
#text=I thanked her for it and went home to read my new book .
